reviewtext: My buddies and I bought this unit way back when at twice the price.  After some setup screwups we all got our linkys working perfectly with our cable modems.  Since then our linkys have been real work horses.  I love the linky hardware firewall protection.  The only time I need to drop protection and go into the linky dmz zone is for MS Netmeeting.  You will not go wrong buying this product.
